name: docker-best-practices
description: Expert guidance and implementation of industry-standard Docker practices including multi-stage builds, security hardening, and resource optimization.
scope: Covers Dockerfile optimization, image security, and container resource limits. Does not cover Kubernetes orchestration or specific cloud-provider container services (ECS/EKS) except where they intersect with local image definitions.

evolution.change_summary: Initial release of Docker Best Practices skill focusing on container optimization and security.
